string-array.name: submission_done_further_info_bullet_points
string-array.item: The duration of the isolation shall be determined by your treating doctor.
In case your disease worsens, please call your selected GP or an emergency doctor.
In case of emergencies, call 112. Tell them that you have a confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection.
Once the isolation is complete, reset the app in the settings so you can use it again.

string-array.name: test_result_card_negative_further_info_bullet_points
string-array.item: Still feeling unwell? If you feel very poorly and/or your symptoms have worsened, please contact your general practitioner.
Remain at home until you feel well again. If you were to get infected with coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2) whilst weakened from another infection, this could lead to a serious illness.
Do not go to work if you feel unwell to ensure you do not put other people at risk.
If your symptoms worsen, you might need a further SARS-CoV-2 test.
